boardgame.name: DC Comics Deck-Building Game
DC Superhelden
DC 超級英雄 牌庫構築遊戲
boardgame.description: Game description from the publisher:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Batman! Superman! Wonder Woman! Aquaman! The Flash! Green Lantern! Cyborg! The Justice League of America is ready for action _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; are you? Fight the never-ending battle for truth, justice, and peace in the DC Comics Deck-Building Game!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;To start the game, each player chooses one of the seven over-sized hero cards, each of which has a special power, and starts with a deck of ten cards. Each turn, a player starts with a hand of five cards and can acquire or conquer the five types of cards in the game: heroes, villains and super-villains, equipment, super powers, and locations. To defeat villains, you'll need to have power _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; but when a super-villain is defeated, a new one comes into play, attacking all the heroes while doing so. Make sure you've acquired defenses _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; like superspeed or bulletproof powers, or The Batsuit equipment _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; to protect yourself from harm._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Craft your hero deck into a well-oiled machine to take on the most vile villains in the DC Universe in your quest for victory (points)!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: Reserved for Toms Reizins (IngussT).
DC Comics Deck-Building Game English first edition Publisher: Cryptozoic Entertainment

Cryptozoic Entertainment (CTZ01532) In the DC Comics Deck-building Game, you take on the role of Batman, Superman, or one of their brave and heroic allies in the struggle against the forces of Super-Villainy! While you begin armed only with basic combat maneuvers, you will add new, more powerful cards to your deck as you go, with the goal of defeating as many of the DC Comics Super-Villains as you can. In the end, the player who has accumulated the most Victory Points from the cards in his or her deck wins the game!

Cryptozoic Entertainment (CTZ01532) In the DC Comics Deck-building Game, you take on the role of Batman, Superman, or one of their brave and heroic allies in the struggle against the forces of Super-Villainy! While you begin armed only with basic combat maneuvers, you will add new, more powerful cards to your deck as you go, with the goal of defeating as many of the DC Comics Super-Villains as you can. In the end, the player who has accumulated the most Victory Points from the cards in his or her deck wins the game!
DC Comics Deck-Building Game English first edition Publisher: Cryptozoic Entertainment

Cryptozoic Entertainment (CTZ01532)
In the DC Comics Deck-building Game, you take on the role of Batman, Superman, or one of their brave and heroic allies in the struggle against the forces of Super-Villainy! While you begin armed only with basic combat maneuvers, you will add new, more powerful cards to your deck as you go, with the goal of defeating as many of the DC Comics Super-Villains as you can. In the end, the player who has accumulated the most Victory Points from the cards in his or her deck wins the game!

Promo - the Martian Manhunter promo Hero Card is included. Sleeves - every card is sleeved, with the main cards using Mayday Premiums and the Hero Cards using Mayday Magnums with the extra sleeve length at the top trimmed off. As you can see in the photo, the cards still fit in the insert, though I have to put the Villain and Weakness cards underneath the Hero Cards (which helps with getting the Hero Cards out as well). Box - is in excellent condition, with no dents or wear. Manual - Great shape. When I got it, it arrived with some small creases on the bottom of the back cover. Shipping - will cost approximately $14 for USPS Priority in the continental US (the box weighs 2 lbs 15 oz if you want to use http://postcalc.usps.com/ )
